text: Anthony Cecil John Dawes (10 February 1928 â€“ 21 January 2021) was an English character actor. Dawes was born in Felixstowe, Suffolk.RADA: Anthony Dawes His roles on television included The Avengers, Fawlty Towers, Z-Cars and The Kenny Everett Television Show. Dawes died in London on 21 January 2021 at the age of 92.Holy Trinity Church Sloane Square, Weekly News, Sunday January 24th 2021 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Aveleyman: Anthony Dawes * British Comedy Guide: Anthony Dawes Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from London
